verbs.description: [V: is] it [ARG2: the flu or norovirus] [ARG1: how to tell the difference] [ARGM-ADV: while it seems nearly everyone in boston is sick or recovering from some kind of ailment many are wondering what they ’ve come down with and how to best manage their symptoms do they have the flu or the stomach flu is it possible to have both at once dr joshua kosowsky vice chair and clinical director of brigham and women hospital emergency department weighs in influenza brigham and womens hospital norovirus diarrhea stomach cramps vomiting dr joshua kosowsky fever immune system cough nausea]
